attributes.action: Make Thanksgiving a holiday Celebration in the UK
attributes.additional_details: It will help people to be more appreciative of what they have.
attributes.background: With this petition we aim to make the American holiday of thanksgiving a holiday which is celebrated in the UK so we can give thanks to things that make us thankful in life.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want Thanksgiving to be celebrated in the UK, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We can accept petitions calling on the Government to make particular days bank holidays, but it is up to individuals whether to celebrate particular occasions.
